node.detail_zh: 患者於大圍交通城地下管理處工作，為 #4854 宗個案患者的同事，被列為緊密接觸者，無外遊記錄，9 月 3 日出現症狀。衞生署在進行個案追蹤時將患者送往威爾斯親王醫院，患者家人 ( 第 #4889 及 #4890 宗個案患者 ) 同日確診，一名非同住家人（第 #4893 宗個案患者）亦於 9 月 8 日確診。
node.detail_en: The patient works at Transport City Building, Tai Wai, and as a colleague of patient #4854 is listed as a close contact. He has no travel history and developed symptoms on September 3. He was transferred to Prince of Wales Hospital during the tracking process by Department of Health, and his family members (#4889 and #4890) are diagnosed positive for the virus on the same day as well. A family member who does not live with him (patient #4893) tested positive on September 8.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 大圍交通城出現小型爆發，6 樓及地下管理處分別出現確診個案。

node.location_en: Fu Pong House, Tai Wo Hau Estate
